name: HumaliensAcademy: Gamesite & Digital Chip Games for Everyone
blurb: Ready for fun! HumaliensAcademy is a cool new hobby game site featuring Superbeing Avatars & winner take all Digital Chip Games

rewards.reward: THE KICKSTARTER: Pre-order 1-month of Single Membership, (valued at $8 at launch). PLUS receive a promotional code to unlock KID POWER's UTLIMATE RARE Promo Chip that will be one of the hardest chips to pull from the entire ROTS collection. NOTE, the KID POWER ULTIMATE RARE Promo Chip is the one in the video and is not the chip in the main image at the top of the page. IN ADDITION, ALL BACKERS will receive the Kid Power Promo Chip as a special thank you for backing us early on! PLUS, CHECK OUT our REWARD UPDATE CENTRAL for the latest giveaways for all Kickstarter Backers! AND ONE FINAL NOTE - REMEMBER all our physical chip games (Knockout, Super, and Ultimate) will be converted to multi-player online 3D games similar to what you see at PKR.com. So plan on seeing your Simulist Avatar controlling your digital chips in 3D and the sleek Player Management System (as seen in the video) is where you'll buy, collect and manage all your chips in 2D. Just to clarify! That said, everything we have done is currently in 2D, but that's why we're here on Kickstarter to be able to complete the "3D Winner-Take-All Digital Chip Games" played in futuristically themed game rooms. Won't you join us! Make your Pre-Order today and follow us every step of the way in 2012.

THE NEWBIE: Pre-order 1 month of Single Membership and 1200 Digital Cash, (valued at $20 at launch). NOTE, DIGITAL CASH also called DC will be HA's virtual money used to buy all the cool in-game items, particularly the Digital Chip Battle Packs and Membership.
THE STUDENT: Pre-order 3 months of Single Membershp and 2500 Digital Cash, (valued at $50 at launch)

THE PLAYER: Okay, this is the sweet spot that includes a free T-Shirt as described in our Reward Update Central. Choose any 1 of the 4 shown. ALSO an invitation to our Beta when we get there for both the HumaliensAcademy's Player Management System and the Humaliens Superbeings Digital Chip Games (Knockout, Super, and Ultimate) likely in 3D, if we can have any kind of success here on Kickstarter. PLUS the 6 months of Single Membership and 5000 Digital Cash, (valued at $100 at launch). And a 500 HAM BONUS that's used to buy posted digital chips at the In-Game Market.

THE SIMULIST: An invitation to our launch party! This party will be for the kids and family. Up to 2 people are invited with this pledge. We'll cover the fun, food and venue only. PLUS, 1 year of Single Membership and 10000 Digital Cash, (valued at $160 at launch)

THE HALING: An invitation to our LAUNCH PARTY! This party is for EVERYONE, both kids and adults. Up to 4 people are invited with this pledge. We'll cover the fun, food and venue only. PLUS, 1 year of Single Membership for 2 people and 20000 Digital Cash, (valued at $320 at launch). ALSO a 1000 HAM BONUS that's used to buy posted digital chips at the In-Game Market. Both the DC and HAM will be divided up equally for the 2 people.

THE FAMILY: An invitation to our launch party! Up to 4 people are invited with this pledge. We'll cover the fun, food and venue only. PLUS, 1 year of Family Membership for 4 people and 20000 Digital Cash, (valued at $300 at launch). ALSO a 2000 HAM BONUS that's used to buy posted digital chips at the In-Game Market. Both the DC and HAM will be divided up equally for the 4 people. IN ADDITION, receive a signed copy of Rick's original 1999 juvenile fiction chapter books: Humaliens-1 and Humaliens-2; and a set of starter decks of the 2003 published Humaliens Trading Card Game. PLUS an extra Humaliens Academy T-Shirt and Hat, and a copy of any GAME APPS we complete for the 1st Year at HA. ALSO a signed Humaliens Superbeings Poster by artist extraordinare Justin Hillgrove. And do check out his latest creations at www.IMPSandMONSTERS.com. NOTE, there will be only 75 of "THE FAMILY" reward available, and this PLEDGE DOES INCLUDE SHIPPING for the BOOKS, CARDS, T-SHIRT, HAT and POSTER which we can honor in January of 2012. For international orders, please add $25 or $325 for this reward.

THE BETA-TESTER/CONTRIBUTOR: An invitation to our launch party! We'll cover the fun, food and venue only. Also, up to 3 people are invited with this pledge. PLUS, 1 year of Single Membership and 15000 Digital Cash, (valued at $210 at launch). AND a 1000 HAM BONUS that's used to buy posted digital chips at the In-Game Market. PLUS a Humaliens Academy T-Shirt, Hat, and a copy of any GAME APPS we complete for the 1st Year at HA. ALSO a signed Humaliens Superbeings Poster by artist extraordinare Justin Hillgrove. And do check out his latest creations at www.IMPSandMONSTERS.com. FURTHERMORE, guaranteed access to participate in our beta-testing of all Humaliens Academy games. And if desired, qualify to work with us remotely on various tasks up through launch in exchange for official contribution credit. This is subject to approval by us based on your testing, programming, and/or design skills. But if you have skills, we're not going to turn you down to help. NOTE, this PLEDGE DOES INCLUDE SHIPPING for the POSTER, T-SHIRT and HAT which we can honor in January of 2012. For international orders, please add $25 or $525 for this reward. FINALLY, a $50 shopping credit to www.MAGICandMONSTERS.com - our very own Kevin Tom's Online Hobby Game Superstore! The launch of the site is targeted for November 1st, 2011 and we'll be able to honor the shopping credit in January of 2012.

THE POST LAUNCH PARTY: All of the $500 reward package. PLUS an invitation to our 1 millionth registered player post launch party! Also, you may invite 1 extra guest as well. This party will be for adults 21 and over. We'll cover the fun, food and venue only. IN ADDITION, you'll receive 1 copy of every digital chip from all sets that will be released at HA for Year 1! That's 3 sets in total, the Rise of the Simulists, Super Alliances, and The Paranormal Extra Terrestrials. PLUS, special thanks in the Credits of the Humaliens Academy Special Thanks page. AND a cool Humaliens Superbeings T-Shirt you'll receive at the Post Launch Party. FINALLY, a $100 shopping credit to www.MAGICandMONSTERS.com - our very own Kevin Tom's Online Hobby Game Superstore! The launch of the site is targeted for November 1st, 2011 and we'll be able to honor the shopping credit in January of 2012. FINALLY, a lifetime Membership to Humaliens Academy for 2 people.

THE SUPERBEING: Intended as a "STUDIO SPONSORSHIP" pledge, this PLEDGE includes all the $1000 reward package. PLUS a Superbeing designed in your honor with the Superbeing's name having parts of your name. IN ADDITION, we will work with you to present an in-game multiple-rotating-ad integrated directly & prominently into the design of the site. The design plan is to devote an entire game room to the $3000 or MORE level pledgers. All ads will have to be rated E for Everyone or E10+ and we'll work with you to reach your desired look. FURTHERMORE, 2 more signed Humaliens posters by artist extraordinaire Justin Hillgrove (3 in total and all different). And do check out his latest creations at www.IMPSandMONSTERS.com. FINALLY, a lifetime Membership to Humaliens Academy for 3 people.

THE CHIEF GAME GUARDIAN: For 1 very special pledger you will receive all of the $3000 reward package. PLUS, all future products that are ever developed by us for the Humaliens Brand. Including all digital chip sets from all future years at HA. FURTHERMORE, you will receive an honorable in-game feature (voice, ad, or other) that will connect you to HA's Chief Game Guardian ZQ. It promises to be a cool thing whatever it is that puts you in the game!
